snippet.title: Unusual Findings — Make-Your-Choice Trailer
snippet.description:
8 bit point-and-click adventure, Unusual Findings, is not only showcasing a brand new gameplay trailer, but also revealing its Kickstarter stretch goals: the game is set to be brought to consoles, including Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series S/X and Playstation 4 and 5!

Support Unusual Findings on Kickstarter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/epicllama/unusual-findings-point-and-click-adventure-to-the-80s

With a non-linear plot that that’s unique for the genre, pixel-perfect art, and fully voice acted, it’s time to go back to a simpler era where mix tapes were a thing, Commodore 64 was king, kids could play outside late at night and the only thing to worry about was THE GIANT KILLER ALIEN TRYING TO GET YOU AND YOUR FRIENDS.

Try the Unusual Findings demo on Steam and wishlist the game — https://store.steampowered.com/app/1605320/Unusual_Findings/
